mapper.select: select m.m_id, m.M_NAME, to_char(m.M_BIRTH, 'yyyy-mm-dd') m_birth, m.M_EMAIL, m.M_TEL, p.P_PIC, p.P_TEXT from CY_PROFILE p join CY_MEMBER m on p.M_ID = m.M_ID where m.m_id = #{m_id}
mapper.update: update CY_PROFILE set m_name = #{m_name}, m_birth = #{m_birth}, m_email = #{m_email}, m_tel = #{m_tel}, p_text = #{p_text} where d_num = #{d_num}
